name: googlebooks-app
description: This project allows users to create an account and utilize the RAWG API to search in a video game library. The user can add the title to their favorites page and view different parameters of that specific game such as rating. There is also a link to purchase the game.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
